SELECT
FROM doc_repertory a
AND a.repertory_code LIKE '%'||#{repertoryCode}||'%' '%'+#{repertoryCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{repertoryCode}, '%')
AND a.repertory_name LIKE '%'||#{repertoryName}||'%' '%'+#{repertoryName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{repertoryName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
